segments.text: Hey! Heard some nice tunes coming from this way. That you, Iris?
Oh, yeah. I was just practicing some singing.
Really trying to get that mermaid training going for the summer.
How you figure that?
Mermaids are supposed to be excellent singers.
I was reading a magazine about it a moment ago and realized
I'm totally posing like a mermaid.
So why not sing a few songs as well?
Hmm, good point! Mind if I cut in for a little bit of a sing-song?
Sure, why not? We can make it a duet!
Whoa! Hey there, little guy! How'd you get over here?
Hey, Ino! What you got in your hand there?
A little taco found his way up the shore.
Actually, it looks like he brought some friends.
Wait a minute... Those two...
You don't think something's drawing all the sea creatures to the beach, do you?
I think I have quite possibly the best idea I've had all summer.
A business proposition.
Something wrong, Kiara?
Yeah, everything all good over there?
Oh, everything's fine over here.
No need to stop singing or anything. You two are sounding great.
Idol training maybe? We should join in too.
Wait, but they're here.
Probably to make sure we don't work too hard on our vacation.
You'll cut us a little slack if we want to do a little work, right?
The stonks are gonna be rolling in!
The girls and their siren songs are gonna make us rich!
And then, we can all go on vacation together!
But Kiara, we're already on vacation.
It's not the same!
You'll help me set up the booth, right?
We're supposed to put you to work, after all.
So...
That's the spirit. Shall we get started then?
Hey, I think the wildlife really likes our singing, Iris.
Aww, I wanted to be a mermaid this summer, not a siren. Maybe we should stop.
I will make you both all-you-can-eat takoyaki if you keep singing.
Oh, okay! In that case, let the show go on.
Eh, I'll pass on the seafood, but I could definitely go for another round of songs if you all are keen.
Ladies and gentlemen, beachgoers of all ages, KFP's very first takoyaki branch is now open for business!
Wow, wonder where she got the ingredients so fast.
Hey you, did you help her or something?
I tried to stop her, I really did!
Hmm, bit suspicious, innit?
Nothing better than the sight of happy beach-going customers on a hot summer day, amirite girls?
Oh, Kiara, where's my promised takoyaki?
Coming right up!
H-hey, guys?
W-what on earth is that?!
Is that... a giant octopus?
Hey you, grab my sword will ya?
We've got to defend this beach!
Sheesh, wonder what could possibly be making that thing so mad?
Hey, where's Ina?
Look, up there!
That raging giant octopus has her in its clutches!
Don't worry about me guys, it's really okay!
It's actually kind of fun being waved around like this!
Hey, you! You're gonna help us save Ina, right?
Yes, that's my blade, all right. We'll handle this from here.
Hey guys! W-wait a minute! I can help too!
And then we're totally chopping up that thing and making more takoyaki for the masses.
All right, you savage beast! Have at you!
I've got customers to feed! Take this!
I'll go grab Ina while it's distracted. Come with! I'll need all the help I can get.
We can't take much more of this. Better make it quick, you two.
I can do this all day!
I am feeling a little dizzy, so maybe you guys can get me down a little sooner?
Hey, Tako, maybe that's enough playing for today?
Hm? What's that? Your friend got turned into Takoyaki, so you're taking revenge?
Uh-oh...
Wah! That's horrible!
Aw, I'm really sorry to hear that, Mr. Tako. We'll find the culprit and make them pay! Just... please put our friend down.
Yay! The battle has been won! Now if you'll excuse me, I've gotta go clean something up really quickly.
Kiara, you're acting awfully sus.
Sus? Me? What are you accusing me of? It was just your business.
